page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I am 12 years old and I go to Frank Montgomery School in Sturry, I am in Form 1R in which there are 12 boys and 11 girls. I travel to school in a friends parent's car, {Todays date 6/7/85} I got up at 8.30am ready to go to the beach.I had Bran Flakes for my breakfast at 8.45am.I got in the car to go to the beach at 9.15am. The beach is in Herne Bay.All my family were going but not all intending to swim in the sea.I had salad for my dinner with some cakes for dessert which my gran had made at home before we came. We got home at 7.15pm and had tea of mince and rice and a drink of Lemonade. After tea I had a bath and washed my hair.By this time it was 8.30pm. Then I dried my hair and watched a television programme and then went to bed with a hot drink.
